oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Programmes de Recherche Pour et Sur le Développement Régional
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of program (2 projects) is about market and supply chains dynamics in the “Pays de la Loire” region and about regional organic cereals and milk supply chains.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} PSDR: Programmes de Recherche Pour et Sur le Développement Régional. [Research programs for and about regional developpment.] Runs 2000 - 2004. Programme Leader(s): Sylvander, Bertil; Roque, Olivier; Fauvet, Marie and David, Christophe.
